basics.name: Macie Tsang
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A in Management Information Systems, as well as Marketing at the Shilder College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

education.area: Marketing and Management Information Systems (expected Fall, 2025)

work.summary: Monitor children grades K-8 in extended learning program.
highlights: Ensure the safety of students during after school care.
Facilitate engaging activities for students to participate in.
Answer questions and assist students during the ICS 101 lab.
Host open labs and provide extra assistance when necessary.

awards.title: Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen with a minimum overall GPA of 3.7 at a Hawai'i school.
